channel.title: General on Bits and pieces to remember

item.title: Hey, 2013 has started!
item.description: Hello, this year I will try to be consistently blogging. There are many things, that float around in my head, and I hope to get them in good shape by blogging about them. This will also remind me of myself later, because I don’t use facebook or other social networks and my online presence is mostly professional. Here will be more stuff later.
